chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
p: protocol
I: dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop
d0: dstatelet
ii: InductiveInv
r: ReceiveInv

Goal:
r \In rts ii -> rcv_transI (rt_inv (r:=r)) \In rcv_trans ProtocolWithIndInv

Premises:
rts = fun i : InductiveInv => let (sts, rts, _, _) := i in rts : InductiveInv -> seq ReceiveInv
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
nid = nat : Set
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
rt_inv : forall r : ReceiveInv, R_inv (rt r)
rcv_trans : forall p : Protocols.protocol, seq (receive_trans (Protocols.coh p))
pred = fun T : Type => T -> bool : Type -> Type Arguments pred _%type_scope
rcv_transI : forall rt : receive_trans coh, R_inv rt -> Transitions.receive_trans CohI
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv r : ReceiveInv |- Type] ?T' : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv r : ReceiveInv |- Type] ?f : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv r : ReceiveInv |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv r : ReceiveInv |- ?T'] ?s : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv r : ReceiveInv |- seq ?T]
stIn : forall s : SendInv, s \In sts ii -> snd_transI (st_inv (s:=s)) \In snd_trans ProtocolWithIndInv
functional_extensionality : forall f g : ?A -> ?B, (forall x : ?A, f x = g x) -> f = g where ?A : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv r : ReceiveInv |- Type] ?B : [p : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop d0 : dstatelet ii : InductiveInv r : ReceiveInv |- Type]
rtsI = [eta map (fun rtt : ReceiveInv => rcv_transI (rt_inv (r:=rtt)))] : seq ReceiveInv -> seq (Transitions.receive_trans CohI) Arguments rtsI _%seq_scope
cohVl : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dstate d)
cohVs : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> valid (dsoup d)
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
Transitions.send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
cohDom : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (d : dstatelet), d \In coh -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d
nodes = Protocols.nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Transitions.msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Transitions.r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
r_step_coh_t : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), (forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) -> nat -> Transitions.receive_step_t coh -> Prop
ur = (fun _evar_0_ : forall (sts : seq SendInv) (rts0 : seq ReceiveInv) (e : [seq st i | i <- sts] = snd_trans p) (e0 : [seq rt i | i <- rts0] = rcv_trans p), (fun i : InductiveInv => is_true (uniq [seq t_rcv i | i <- rtsI (rts i)])) (II e e0) => match ii as i return ((fun i0 : InductiveInv => is_true (uniq [seq t_rcv i | i <- rtsI (rts i0)])) i) with | @II x x0 x1 x2 => _evar_0_ x x0 x1 x2 end) (fun (sts : seq SendInv) (rts0 : seq ReceiveInv) (Hs : [seq st i | i <- sts] = snd_trans p) (Hr : [seq rt i | i <- rts0] = rcv_trans...
cohpred_PredType = fun nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid => mkPredType (Coherence.sort (nodes:=nodes)) : (dstatelet -> pred nid) -> PredType dstatelet Arguments cohpred_PredType _%function_scope
Transitions.ReceiveTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_rcv : nat) (msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) (receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh), Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step -> Transitions.receive_trans coh
ReceiveTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_rcv : nat) (msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool) (receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh), Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step -> Transitions.receive_trans coh
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
rt = fun r : ReceiveInv => let (rt, _) := r in rt : ReceiveInv -> receive_trans coh
Mem_map : forall (T T' : Type) (f : T -> T') (x : T) (s : seq T), x \In s -> f x \In [seq f i | i <- s]
Image_mem : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (P : Pred A) (x : A), x \In P -> f x \In [Image f i | i <- P]
send_step_t = Transitions.send_step_t : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments send_step_t _%function_scope
rcv_uniq0 = fun nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid => fun=> is_true_true : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags ([::] : seq (receive_trans coh))) Arguments rcv_uniq0 {nodes}%function_scope {coh}
snd_uniq0 = fun nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid => fun=> is_true_true : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), uniq (Protocols.snd_tags ([::] : seq (send_trans coh))) Arguments snd_uniq0 {nodes}%function_scope {coh}
Protocols.nodes = fun p : Protocols.protocol => let (nodes, _, coh, snd_trans, rcv_trans, _, _) := p in nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid
Record receive_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := ReceiveTrans { t_rcv : nat; msg_wf : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool; receive_step : Transitions.receive_step_t coh; r_step_coh : Transitions.r_step_coh_t msg_wf t_rcv receive_step } Arguments Transitions.receive_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.ReceiveTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_rcv]%nat_scope [msg_wf]%function_scope [receive_step]
image_spec_sind : forall (A B : Type) (P : Pred A) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (P0 : SProp), (forall a : A, b = f a -> a \In P -> P0) -> image_spec P f b -> P0

```coq
intros r Hr.
apply Mem_map_inv in Hr.
destruct Hr as [y [Hry Hy]].
rewrite Hry.
apply Image_mem.
apply Hy.
Qed.```

original: intros r Hr. apply Mem_map_inv in Hr. destruct Hr as [y [Hry Hy]]. rewrite Hry. apply Image_mem. apply Hy.
